front.title: BGP Usage for SD-WAN Overlay Networks

abstract.t: The document discusses the usage and applicability of BGP as the control plane for multiple scenarios of SD-WAN (Software Defined WAN) overlay networks. The document aims to demonstrate how the BGP-based control plane is used for large-scale SD-WAN overlay networks with little manual intervention. SD-WAN edge nodes are commonly interconnected by multiple types of underlay networks owned and managed by different network providers.
